body_html:
@GPhilo I guess Dataset.list_files line invokes code Dataset.from_tensor_slices(gen_io_ops.matching_files(file_pattern))
which returns : A Dataset of strings corresponding to file names.
Probably,it keeps digging till it hits no folders/directories!
The file pattern follows rules as described here tf.gfile.Glob
see code snipped below which is a cause for lookup into _should_be_ignored

if isinstance(file_pattern, list):
    if not file_pattern:
      raise ValueError("File pattern is empty.")
    file_names = []
    for entry in file_pattern:
      file_names.extend(gfile.Glob(entry))
  else:
    file_names = list(gfile.Glob(file_pattern))
